---
title: "The FixedHeader Extension"
output:
  html_document:
    includes: null
---

Here is an example of the `FixedHeader` extension. Scroll down the page, and you will always see the table header.

```{r}
library(DT)
datatable(
  iris, options = list(pageLength = 50), extensions = 'FixedHeader'
)
```
